entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
